Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Provenance unknown. The accession number associated with this gift is 1950.244.
Historical/Biographical Note
Arthur Felberbaum (1935-1979) was a founder of The New York Marxist School, which grew out of the New York Committee for Marxist Education.
Scope and Content Note
The collection contains materials relating to The New York Marxist School and to other activities of Arthur Felberbaum.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection, created by Arthur Felberbaum, was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
